go-unityでのgoでの色々テストするリポジトリ

# What we have done in this repository
1. rest api
2. grpc api

# require
* go 1.17.13
* Unity 2021.3.17f1

# how to use
## go

1. run go file for rest api
`go run hello.go`

2. grpc api for grpc
`go run grpc_server.go`


## unity
1. download grpc plugin(`grpc_unity_package.2.45.0`) at [url](https://packages.grpc.io/archive/2022/02/cc3de1c3eba4c342c406729649f3c39f829dcdbc-24ad316a-7a17-4194-ac29-a95eceae67c6/index.xml)
2. import unity new package for plugin it got 1.
3. download grpc tools(`Grpc.Tools.2.45.0`) for [url](https://packages.grpc.io/archive/2022/02/cc3de1c3eba4c342c406729649f3c39f829dcdbc-24ad316a-7a17-4194-ac29-a95eceae67c6/index.xml)

# update files what generated by protoc

1. `cd proto`

## go
```bash
protoc --go_out=../go --go_opt=paths=source_relative --go-grpc_out=../go --go-grpc_opt=paths=source_relative user.proto
```

## unity(C#)

* [作ってわかる！ はじめてのgRPC](https://zenn.dev/hsaki/books/golang-grpc-starting)
* [gRPCとProtocol Buffersによるアプリケーション間通信 / Unity](https://note.com/npaka/n/n050b1aba7772)
